products.title: A.P.C. Daniela Logo-Print Denim Tote Bag
products.body_html:
A.P.C.'s tote bag is made from sturdy denim that'll hold both weekly groceries and lighter cargo with ease. It's printed with a flipped version of the brand's initials and has an internal pocket to keep your wallet, keys and phone within easy reach.

  • Dark-blue and white denim
  • Two top handles, designer emblem
  • Internal pocket
  • This bag has a capacity of approximately 20 litres

Size & Fit

 

  • Handle Length: 60cm / 23.6in
  • Height: 35cm / 13.8in
  • Width: 45cm / 17.7in

    •  

    Care & Laundry

    Machine wash according to instructions on care label

products.title: and Wander Dyneema Stuffsack
products.body_html:
A lightweight and durable stuff sack from And Wander produced using DSM Dyneema composite fabric (Cuben fiber). Dyneema is used for its waterproofness, tear strength, and exceptionally light weight. The bag features one main compartment with a drawstring top opening and adjustable dual carry handles. The Dyneema Stuff Sack is finished with a black And Wander logo printed on the front.

- Dyneema 100% Polyester
- Durable, lightweight, and waterproof
- Drawstring main compartment
- Adjustable carry handles
- Made in Japan


Size & Fit

30cm x 40cm

Care & Laundry

Machine wash according to instructions on care label

products.title: and Wander Heather Waist Bag Charcoal
products.body_html:
A light and sturdy waist bag from Japanese outdoor brand. Features adjustable waist strap, double zip fastening and adjustable front straps. Reflective logo printed on the front.  The waist back with compression tape. It can be used around the waist or on the shoulder.

100% Polyester
 Lining 100% nylon
Weight 190g


Size & Fit

30cm W x 11cm H x 8cm D

Care & Laundry

Machine wash according to instructions on care label

products.title: Axel Arigato Marathon Sneaker White Silver
products.body_html:
These Marathon sneakers from Axel Arigato are made in Portugal using a sporty combination of mesh and leather. Covered in white and silver, they’re fitted with handy pull tabs and completed with durable black rubber outsole tooling.

  • Mesh Uppers
  • Leather Overlays
  • Pull Tabs
  • Foam Midsole
  • Rubber Outsole
  • Made in Portugal


      Size & Fit

      SHOE SIZES

        US EU
      UK 2.5 - 35
      UK 3.5 - 36
      UK 4 - 37
      UK 5 - 38
      UK 6 7 39
      UK 6.5 7.5 40
      UK 7 8 41
      UK 8 9 42
      UK 9 10 43
      UK 9.5 10.5 44
      UK 10 11 45
      UK 11 12 46
      UK 12 13 47


      Care & Laundry

      The use of a washing machine is not recommended as it may alter the properties of the different materials.
      Before you wear the shoes for the first time, we advise you to waterproof your shoes with a spray adapted to the material and to repeat this operation regularly.

products.title: BEAMS DOT Vintage Style Bandana Overshirt
products.body_html:
A bandana pattern shirt with an eye-catching patchwork-like design placed at random is released. The cotton material is a nice point to wear lightly. By washing after the product, the atmosphere is improved and it has a vintage-like look.
Because it has a loose silhouette, it goes well with wide silhouette pants such as buggy pants and balloon pants. We recommend not only the classic American casual coordination with chinos and denim, but also the beautiful coordination with slacks and skinny pants.

100% Cotton

    Size & Fit

    Model Height: 5'11"
    Model Size: L

    Care & Laundry

    Machine wash according to instructions on care label

products.title: BEAMS x Abu Garcia Limited Edition Shorts Black
products.body_html:
Abu Garcia, an otherwise unassuming fishing brand, has exploded in popularity in Japan over the past year, following suit with Japanese-operated DAIWA. Issued in timeless black and military-adjacent olive drab, the collection comprises a few fishing essentials, remixed with contemporary cool and comfort-minded cuts.

The collection are made by tough water-resistant stretch polyester, retaining the reliable nature that customers expect from Abu Garcia.

Size & Fit

Model Height: 5'9"
Model Size: M

Care & Laundry

Machine wash according to instructions on care label

products.title: Birkenstock Zurich Suede Sandals Mink
products.body_html:
The BIRKENSTOCK Zurich model combines the stability of a closed-toe shoe with the lightness of a sandal and is popular in equal measure among both men and women. Although closed at the sides, this version is open at the toes and heel to ensure the feet gets enough air exposure.

- Solid tone toe post brand print sandals
- Cow leather upper
- Cow leather inner
- EVA outsole
- Slip on style



    Size & Fit

    True to size

    Care & Laundry

    N/A
